page.title: Become a Client
page.subtitle: You're just a few steps away from becoming an investor with The Family Office. We just need further information to finalize your contract.
page.description: You're just a few steps away from becoming an investor with The Family Office. We just need further information to finalize your contract.

heading.title: Start your relationship with The Family Office

description.active: Provide your personal and tax information.
Answer quick questions regarding your investment experience and current investments.
description.inactive: Complete your personal details to unlock this step.

description.active: Share copies of your National ID and passport, and upload a live selfie.
description.inactive: Complete your investment experience details to unlock this step.

kycIncomeDetails.heading: Income and Wealth
kycIncomeDetails.description: Please enter your annual income details.

tooltip.text: It is the value of your total assets minus your total liabilities.

options.PaymentInstitutionsAndElectronicMoneyIns: Payment Institutions and Electronic Money Institutions (including MSBs providing Money Transmission Services and Currency Exchange Service)
options.PetroleumProductsProductionTrading: Production and/or wholesale trading of petroleum products, such as oil and petrol, energy such as natural gas / CO2 emissions and wind power
options.TradingOfArtCollections: Trading of art collections (such as paintings, sculpture)

tooltip.text: The source of wealth is all activities that generated or contributed to the accumulation of the user's funds and assets over time.
The source of funds is the origin of funds being transferred to our account during the business relationship.

KycPepCheck.title: Politically Exposed Person (PEP) Confirmation
KycPepCheck.description: Are you a politically exposed person (PEP)?

fullLegalName.label: Full legal name of the PEP
fullLegalName.placeholder: Full legal name of the PEP

errors.future: You cannot add a future date, please enter a valid date.

radio.label: Are you a politically exposed person (PEP)?

YesIamPepRelated.title: Yes, I am related to a PEP

NoIamNotPep.title: No, I am not a PEP

tooltip.text: A politically exposed person (PEP) is someone entrusted with prominent public functions. PEPs include heads of state, heads of government, ministers, deputy or assistant ministers, members of Parliament, members of the boards of central banks, ambassadors and chargés d’affaires, members of the administrative, management or supervisory bodies of state-owned enterprises, and members of high-level judicial bodies whose decisions are not generally subject to further appeal. PEPs include the family members and close business associates of PEPs and beneficial owners of a property held by PEPs.

KycEmploymentDetails.title: Employment Details
KycEmploymentDetails.description: Please enter the answer applicable to your last active employment activity.

options.humanHealth: Human health and social work activities
options.waterSupply: Water supply, sewerage and waste remediation

areYouDirectorOfListedCompany.label: Are you an executive or director in a publicly listed company?

KycEmployerDetails.description: Please enter the answer applicable to your last active employment activity.

kycReasonablenessCheck.title: Reasonableness Check
kycReasonablenessCheck.description: Some details are inconsistent. Please provide additional information.

addressNotMatchTaxResidence.label: Your address does not match your declared tax residence. Please select a reason.

options.AddressNotMatchTaxResidence1: I have not spent enough time as a foreign resident in the country to qualify as a tax resident.
options.AddressNotMatchTaxResidence2: I moved recently to my current residential address, and have not spent enough time in the country to qualify as a tax resident.
options.AddressNotMatchTaxResidence3: I am working overseas temporarily and have not spent enough time in the country of residence to qualify as a tax resident.
options.AddressNotMatchTaxResidence4: The residential address belongs to my spouse/parent.

phoneNumberNotMatchTaxResidence.label: The phone number you provided does not match your declared tax residence. Please select a reason.

options.PhoneNumberNotMatchTaxResidence1: I currently work/study/reside overseas and have no access to the phone number linked to my tax residence.

nationalityNotMatchTaxResidence.label: Your declared tax residence does not match your nationality or nationalities. Please select a reason.

options.NationalityNotMatchTaxResidence1: Taxation laws in my country of citizenship do not define tax residency.
options.NationalityNotMatchTaxResidence2: I live/ work in Bahrain, and I am not a tax resident of my country of citizenship.
options.NationalityNotMatchTaxResidence3: I work/ reside overseas and have a tax identification number (TIN) in my country of work/ residence.

tooltip.label: Tax domicile is the permanent home where the person pays their state income tax. Some tax domiciles may not allow processing this application.
Tax residence is determined under the domestic tax laws of each jurisdiction. A person who qualifies as a tax resident of more than one jurisdiction would be a tax resident in more than one country.

errors.unique: Each tax residency must be added once.

reasonForNoTin.label: Reason for not having a TIN

options.CountryNotIssueTin: My country of residence does not issue a TIN

taxableInUsa.label: Are you taxable in the US?
taxableInUsa.popover: <0><1>A person taxable in the U.S. means:</1><2></2><3><4>ِA US citizen, resident, partnership, corporation, estate, or</4><4>A trust that is either:<5><6>subject to the primary supervision of a court within the U.S., or</6><6>controlled by one or more U.S. persons.</6></5></4></3></0>

modal.title: Are you taxable in the US?
modal.description: <0><1>A person taxable in the U.S. means:</1><2></2><3><4>ِA US citizen, resident, partnership, corporation, estate, or</4><4>A trust that is either:<5><6>subject to the primary supervision of a court within the U.S., or</6><6>controlled by one or more U.S. persons.</6></5></4></3></0>

page.title: ID Verification
page.description: All investment involves an element of risk. To propose the right portfolio for you, we need to understand your comfort level. Please rate each statement according to how strongly you agree with it.

questionInfo.description: This is to ensure that you are eligible to invest with The Family Office.

mobileViewMessages.bright: The image should be clear and easy to read.
mobileViewMessages.corner: All corners of the document should be visible.
mobileViewMessages.blur: The document should occupy the majority of the picture.
mobileViewMessages.allowedFormat: Please upload .jpg, .jpeg, .png and pdf files only.

passportInfoStep.heading: Upload Documents
passportInfoStep.description: Use your webcam to photograph your documents and record a live photo.

uploadBox.title: Bring your passport information page close to the camera
uploadBox.tooltipText: You can upload an image from your computer. Supported files are .jpg, .jpeg, .png and pdf only.

passportSignatureStep.heading: Scan the document
passportSignatureStep.subtitle: Passport signature page
passportSignatureStep.description: Use your webcam to scan the signature page of your passport

uploadBox.title: Bring your passport signature page close to the camera and click "take photo" to capture it.
uploadBox.tooltipText: Upload an image from your computer. Supported files are .jpg, .jpeg, .png and pdf only.

nationalIdCardFrontStep.heading: Upload Documents
nationalIdCardFrontStep.subtitle: Front side of your national ID card
nationalIdCardFrontStep.description: Use your webcam to scan the front side of your national ID card.

uploadBox.title: Bring the front side of your national ID card close to the camera
uploadBox.tooltipText: You can upload an image from your computer. Supported files are .jpg, .jpeg, .png and pdf only.

nationalIdCardBackStep.heading: Upload Documents
nationalIdCardBackStep.subtitle: Backside of your national ID card
nationalIdCardBackStep.description: Use your webcam to scan the back side of your national ID card

uploadBox.title: Bring the back of your national ID card closer to the camera
uploadBox.tooltipText: You can upload an image from your computer. Supported files are .jpg, .jpeg, .png and pdf only.

livePhotoStep.heading: Live photo
livePhotoStep.description: Position your face inside the oval to start the recording.

scheduleVideoCall.heading: Schedule a Video Identification Appointment
scheduleVideoCall.description:
Our business support team will verify your identity and guide you to sign your legally binding documents.
The earliest available appointment is within 7 business days.

errors.unavailable: No time slots available for selected date. Please pick another date.

documentVerification.heading: Verify ID on your mobile
documentVerification.description1: We will guide you through the required steps while you use your mobile to photograph your documents and record a live photo.
documentVerification.description2: You also have the option to upload photos of your documents if available.

error.title: An error occurred while complete the verification. Please try again.

exit.title: Are you sure you want to exit?

confirmModal.content: We are not able to save your ID uploads before the process is complete. If you leave this screen, you will be asked to re-upload your documents.

page.title: ID verification complete
page.description: A confirmation that the ID verification is complete once you finish uploading all required documents.

completionStep.heading: Registration Complete!
completionStep.confirmationText1: Thank you for completing your registration. Your information is being processed. Your dedicated financial advisor will contact you when the process is complete.
completionStep.confirmationText2: You will receive your account opening forms by email so you sign them.
completionStep.confirmationText3: <0>For inquiries, please contact our business support team at <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> quoting your onboarding ID {{onboardingId}}.</0>

hybridFlow.heading: Upload successful.
hybridFlow.confirmationText1: We have successfully captured  your documents and live photo.
hybridFlow.confirmationText2: You can now return to your computer to continue.

page.title: session stopped
page.description: This page is displayed on hybrid flow when session is ended from desktop.

sessionStopped.heading: Session Stopped
sessionStopped.description: To complete ID verification, please click 'Back' on your desktop and restart this step.

sorryModal.heading: Thank you for your interest!
sorryModal.contentKSA: <0><1>Unfortunately, we are unable to process your application at present.</1><1>The Family Office does not yet serve investors who:</1><2><3>Are US citizens or residents, or taxable in the US</3><3>Are citizens of sanctioned countries</3><3>Do not meet the minimum requirements to qualify as clients.</3></2><1>Do not hesitate to contact us again if your situation changes.</1><4>*Please refer to the standard disclaimer on our website.</4><5></5></0>
sorryModal.contentNonKSA: <0><1>Unfortunately, we are unable to process your application at present.</1><1>The Family Office does not yet serve investors who:</1><2><3>Are US citizens or residents, or taxable in the US</3><3>Are citizens of sanctioned countries</3><3>Do not meet the minimum requirements to qualify as clients.</3></2><1>Do not hesitate to contact us again if your situation changes.</1><4>*Please refer to the standard disclaimer on our website.</4><5></5></0>

text.description: If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

confirmModal.title: Are you sure you want to go back?
confirmModal.content: Your documents cannot be saved before the process is complete. If you leave this screen, you must upload your documents again.

qrCodeGenerationModal.heading: Continue on mobile
qrCodeGenerationModal.title: Scan the QR code to access the secure link on your mobile.
qrCodeGenerationModal.linkCTA: How to scan a QR code

howToScanQrModal.heading: How to scan a QR code
howToScanQrModal.description: <0><1>Open your camera app and point your device at the QR code.</1><2>Wait for your camera to recognize and scan the QR code.</2><3>Tap the banner or notification when it appears.</3><4>The page will automatically load on your device.</4></0>

geoLocationConsentModal.heading: The Family Office needs access to your location
geoLocationConsentModal.description: We need access to your location during the onboarding process for security reasons. Please disable VPN or DNS if activated.

error.title: An error occurred while attempting verification. Please try again.
